item.title: Real Fuel Prices v09.08.2025 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

Real Fuel Prices v09.08.2025 ETS2

The mod replaces the fuel prices in the game with real ones.
Compatible with all popular maps.

Prices updated as of August 9, 2025

Credits: Nener

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SibirMap Pink fix v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

SibirMap Pink fix v1.0 ETS2

This small but essential addon fixes a visual artifact that appears on buildings in the city of Omsk in the SibirMap map when using large mod packs or other modifications. In certain configurations, some buildings may lose their textures and appear with a pink tint.
It’s important to understand that this is not a bug in the SibirMap itself, but rather a result of resource conflicts between different mods — especially when loading a large amount of content simultaneously. Such issues are common in complex mod setups, where different authors may use similar files or overlapping IDs.
SibirMap Pink Fix resolves this conflict carefully, without modifying the original map files, only correcting the problematic elements. The mod is fully compatible with current versions of SibirMap and requires no additional configuration — simply add it to your profile before the main map.
With this modification, you can enjoy a detailed and beautiful Omsk without distracting visual glitches, while maintaining game stability and integrity.

Credits: WerWolf

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Reforma Sierra Nevada Remake v1.7.3.155 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

Reforma Sierra Nevada Remake v1.7.3.155 ATS

Changelogs 1.7.3.155
Fix update to city defs and companies issue
*Bug fixes over the map.

v1.7.2.155
Fix Update Related to SCS Changes in ATS 1.55
We recently discovered an issue affecting all files, caused by changes in SCS’s game packing system for version 1.55.
To ensure proper game performance, you must replace all previous files with the updated ones.
The old files were causing in-game stuttering and low FPS, which should now be resolved with this new repack.
Additionally, this update includes several bug fixes on the map based on recent user reports.

Description :
expands the game world to include the stunning Sierra Nevada region in California, USA. Players can explore the scenic highways that wind through the towering peaks, verdant forests, and sparkling lakes of the Sierra Nevada mountain range. The mod includes detailed recreations of real-world locations such as Lake Tahoe, Yosemite National Park, and the city of Reno, Nevada. With challenging terrain and breathtaking scenery,

Mega Resources is required

Credits: Eblem

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Reforma v2.9.3.3.155 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

Reforma v2.9.3.3.155 ATS

Changes 2.9.3.3.155
– Invisible walls, glitches corrected
– Crashing issues fixes

v2.9.3.155
Fix Update Related to SCS Changes in ATS 1.55
We recently discovered an issue affecting all files, caused by changes in SCS’s game packing system for version 1.55.
To ensure proper game performance, you must replace all previous files with the updated ones.
The old files were causing in-game stuttering and low FPS, which should now be resolved with this new repack.
Additionally, this update includes several bug fixes on the map based on recent user reports.

Description :
The Reforma mod includes a range of new features, including custom assets, improved lighting and weather effects, and more challenging and realistic road layouts.

Credits: Eblem

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 9, 2025

Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz v1.0 ETS2

The Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz is a popular mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2, especially among players who enjoy a more realistic Brazilian trucking experience. This mod focuses on a specific type of container chassis trailer made by the Brazilian manufacturer Guerra. It’s designed to carry containers, offering a unique set of cargo challenges compared to standard freight.

What to Expect from the Mod
A good quality Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz mod typically includes a high level of detail and customization to make the trailer feel authentic. You can expect features such as:
Detailed 3D Model: The trailer is modeled with a high degree of accuracy, including realistic textures and details of the chassis, axles, and container locks.
Multiple Axle Configurations: Many versions of this mod offer different axle setups (e.g., 2-axle, 3-axle, “Vanderleia”) to handle various load weights and regional regulations.
Custom Cargo: The mod often comes with its own pack of custom container loads, with different skins and weights, giving you a wide variety of jobs to take on.
Realistic Physics: The mod is designed to handle like a real container trailer, which can feel different from other trailer types. You’ll need to be mindful of the weight distribution and center of gravity.

How to Find and Install the Mod
Since this is a third-party mod, you’ll need to find a reliable source to download it.
1. Search for the Mod: Look for “Guerra Porta Container Arnaiz ETS2 mod” on YouTube or modding websites. Many mod creators showcase their work on YouTube and provide download links in the video descriptions.
2. Download the File: The mod will likely be a compressed file (like a `.zip` or `.rar`) containing a `.scs` file.
3. Install the Mod:
Extract the downloaded file to get the `.scs` file.
Copy and paste the `.scs` file into your Euro Truck Simulator 2 mod folder, which is located at `Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod`.
4. Activate in-game:
Start ETS2 and go to the **Mod Manager** before you load your profile.
Find the Guerra Porta Container mod in the list and double-click it to activate it. Make sure you apply the changes.
5. Purchase the Trailer: Once in the game, go to the **Trailer Dealer** and find the new Guerra container trailer to buy and customize it.

These types of mods are a great way to add a fresh challenge to your virtual trucking career. Enjoy hauling those containers!

Credits: LULA BOLSONARO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
